record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, DECEMBER 10, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, DECEMBER 10, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - December 06, 2007)

[Page: H14448]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: LEE
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet to 3 p.m. on Monday next, and further, when the House adjourns on that day, it adjourn to meet at 10:30 a.m. on Tuesday, December 11, for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
